metadata.dc:author: Vieytes, M R
Louzao, M C
Botana, L M
de la Cruz, L F
metadata.dc:description: Rat lung mast cells were stimulated with drugs with distinct mechanisms of action, namely concanavalin A, compound 48/80 ionophore A23187, in the presence of the beta adrenergic agonist (-)isoproterenol. Cells show a high response when they are stimulated with FNa-calcium. Isoproterenol does not inhibit histamine release induced by any stimuli, but enhances the response to concanavalin A and compound 48/80. Results point to the lack of beta activity on rat lung mast cells.
metadata.dc:title: Efecto del isoproterenol sobre la liberación de histamina en mastocitos de pulmón de rata.
[Effect of isoproterenol on the liberation of histamine from rat lung mast cells].
